name: Bob Belcher
quote: All right, listen. You're my children, and I love you. But you're all terrible at what you do here, and I feel like I should tell you I'd fire all of you if I could.

name: Linda Belcher
quote: Mommy doesn't get drunk. She just has fun.

name: Tina Belcher
quote: Is it bad to be attracted to a cartoon fox that you don't even know that well?

name: Gene Belcher
quote: You should know when you hold hands with me, you are holding hands with everything Iâ€™ve ever eaten.

name: Louise Belcher
quote: The best part about working here is my dad's total disregard for child labor laws. It feels great to be an accessory to a crime every single day without even trying.
